long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Space Invaders - Chrome Extension
Blast off into retro gaming with Space Invaders, the classic Chrome Extension that brings the iconic arcade shooter to your browser!

Defend Earth from waves of invading aliens by moving your ship and blasting them down before they reach the ground. With simple controls and addictive gameplay, you’ll experience the thrill of saving the planet while racking up high scores.

Featuring vibrant graphics and nostalgic sound effects, Space Invaders is perfect for both new players and fans of the classic.

Download Space Invaders and relive the arcade action today!

Play Space Invaders on any page, with just one click.
Space Invaders Original focuses on being Fast, Resource-Saving, and Fun. Space Invaders is for all ages. Reminisce about the classic, childhood games of the 90s. Enjoy!
